attributes.action: Make Hotpoint, Indesit & Creda work quicker to deal with faulty tumble dryers.
attributes.background: Hotpoint, Indesit and Creda have issued a recall on certain tumble dryers because of a fire risk.Dryers have been bursting into flames and some people have lost their homes.Customers are wanting quicker responses.They are still being told the dryers can be used.Customers want quicker action.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You can find more information about making a report to Trading Standards here: 

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/consumer/get-more-help/report-to-trading-standards/
